DefaultView.Heading.title: Own the Passion
DefaultView.Heading.description: With LaLiga Golazos, own limited edition NFTs of the best Moments in LaLiga history.
DefaultView.Banner1.title: LaLiga Golazos is a new way to engage with the beautiful game. Collect video NFTs of the best Moments in LaLiga history, featuring your favorite teams and players.
DefaultView.Banner2.title: Don’t miss out!
DefaultView.Feature1.title: Unrivaled Access
DefaultView.Feature1.description: Your LaLiga Golazos collection doubles a rewards program, unlocking some of the most epic experiences Football can offer.
DefaultView.Feature2.title: Past & Present Legends of LaLiga
DefaultView.Feature2.description: Collect Moments of icons from LaLiga's rich history, to new stars looking to build their legacy.
DefaultView.Feature3.title: Limited Edition Video Collectibles
DefaultView.Feature3.description: Each Moment on LaLiga Golazos has a edition size, indicating how rare that Moment is, with the most iconic moments being the scarcest and most sought after.
DefaultView.Feature4.title: Online Global Marketplace
DefaultView.Feature4.description: As you build your collection, buy sell and trade Moments with other community members in a 24/7 online marketplace.
AuthenticatedView.Heading.title: Congrats, you’re on the waitlist
AuthenticatedView.Heading.topXX.title: Top XX
AuthenticatedView.Heading.topXX.descript: will receive access to our closed beta.
AuthenticatedView.Heading.topYY.title: Top YY
AuthenticatedView.Heading.topYY.descript: will also receive an airdrop moment/some other incentive.
